hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad:Um 'Atiyya said: "Our Prophet ordered us to come out (on `Id day) with the mature girls and the virgins staying in seclusion." Hafsa narrated the above mentioned Hadith and added, "The mature girls or virgins staying in seclusion but the menstruating women had to keep away from the Musalla

chapter.ara-name: باب خُرُوجِ النِّسَاءِ وَالْحُيَّضِ إِلَى الْمُصَلَّى
chapter.eng-name: The coming out of the ladies and menstruating women to the Masjid
